definitions.definition: A musical composition with lyrics for voice or voices, performed by singing .
examples: Thomas listened to his favorite song on the radio yesterday.

definitions.definition: The act or art of singing .
A melodious sound made by a bird , insect , whale or other animal .
examples: I love hearing the song of canary birds.

definitions.definition: The distinctive sound that a male bird utters to attract a mate or to protect his territory ; contrasts with call ; also, similar vocalisations made by female birds.
A low price , especially one under the expected value ; chiefly in for a song .
examples: He bought that car for a song .

definitions.definition: An object of derision ; a laughing stock .

main_definition: ( music ) A musical composition with lyrics for voice or voices, performed by singing .
secondary_definitions: The act or art of singing .
A melodious sound made by a bird , insect , whale or other animal .
( ornithology ) The distinctive sound that a male bird utters to attract a mate or to protect his territory ; contrasts with call ; also, similar vocalisations made by female birds.
A low price , especially one under the expected value ; chiefly in for a song .
( obsolete ) An object of derision ; a laughing stock .
